Uses of Interface
asciipanel.AsciiBrush

Packages that use AsciiBrush
Package Description
asciipanel  
imageeditor  

  • Uses of AsciiBrush in asciipanel

    Classes in asciipanel that implement AsciiBrush
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  LinearBrush
    A useful abstract class that simplifies the implementation of many kind of brushes: specifically those that work by executing an operation for each point on the line.
    Methods in asciipanel that return AsciiBrush
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    AsciiBrush AsciiPainter.getActiveBrush()
    Gets the brush used for drawing lines
    Methods in asciipanel with parameters of type AsciiBrush
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    AsciiPainter AsciiPainter.brush​(AsciiBrush brush)
    Sets the brush to be used for drawing lines.
    void AsciiPainter.setActiveBrush​(AsciiBrush activeBrush)
    Sets the brush to be used for drawing lines

  • Uses of AsciiBrush in imageeditor

    Classes in imageeditor that implement AsciiBrush
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  CharacterBrush
    This implementation of the AsciiBrush interface draws a line by writing a specific character at each point of the line, with the active background and foreground color of the painter that is used to draw.
    class  EraserBrush
    This implementation of the AsciiBrush interface erases a line by replacing the character at each point of the line with a space, while preserving foreground and background colors.
